title: The Princess and the Goblin
description: The Princess Irene has been kidnapped by Goblins. And it is up to an unlikely hero, Curdie the Miner Boy, to save the day.An amazing tale from one of the founders of modern fantasy, GeorgeMacDonald. Including illustrations from a late 1900th century edition.Praise for George MacDonald"I have never concealed the fact that I regarded him as my master; indeed I fancy I have never written a book in which I did not quote from him."C. S. Lewis"George MacDonald is preeminently a mythopoeic writer... In his power... to project his inner life into images, beings, landscapes which are valid for all, he is one of the most remarkable writers of the nineteenth century."W. H. Auden
author: George MacDonald
